perturbation.original_text: A. “Contract Period” shall mean that period of time of three (3) years commencing on November 1st, 2017 and concluding November 2nd, 2020, unless terminated sooner or extended as provided in this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: A. “Contract Period” shall mean that period of time of three (3) years commencing on November 1st, 2017 and concluding November 2nd, 2020. Alternatively, the "Agreement Term" refers to a potentially shorter or longer duration, subject to the renewal clause outlined in Section Fifteen.
perturbation.explanation: The introduction of “Agreement Term” as an alternative to “Contract Period”, while not explicitly defined, introduces ambiguity. This conflicts with the original definition of the “Contract Period” as a fixed three-year term, as it suggests the period may be subject to change or interpretation, causing confusion about the actual duration of the agreement.

perturbation.original_text:
In consideration of the endorsement rights granted under this Agreement, Company shall provide the following remuneration:

A. An initial one-time license fee of $35,000.00USD (Thirty-Five Thousand Dollars) payable to the NFLA-NC
perturbation.changed_text:
In consideration of the endorsement rights granted under this Agreement, Company shall provide the following remuneration:

A. An initial one-time service fee of $35,000.00USD (Thirty-Five Thousand Dollars) payable to the NFLA-NC
perturbation.explanation: Changing "license fee" to "service fee" without a corresponding definition creates ambiguity. It is unclear if these terms are interchangeable or if they have different implications regarding the nature of the payment and any associated rights or obligations. This can create confusion and potentially impact the enforceability of the payment obligation.

perturbation.original_text:
SECTION SEVEN. PAYMENTS

All payments shall be made by wire transfer drawn to the account of NFLA-NC no later than ten (10) business days after the end of each quarter as follows:

$0.05 per Unit as described herein of Company’s Products sold in the Contract Territory payable to NFLA-NC. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the NFLA-NC beginning on the first full quarter (three month period) of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis thereafter for the term of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
SECTION SEVEN. PAYMENTS

All payments shall be made by wire transfer drawn to the account of NFLA-NC no later than ten (10) business days after the end of each quarter as follows:

$0.05 per Unit as described herein of Company’s Products sold in the Contract Territory payable to NFLA-NC. The monetary amount shall be contributed to the NFLA-NC beginning on the first full quarter (three month period) of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis thereafter for the term of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The term "Donated amounts" is replaced by the term "monetary amount" in the description, it creates ambiguity on the nature of the exchange, for accounting and tax considerations. The company can claim it as a charitable donation or a royalty payment.
